name: FIND YOUR KNIFE!!!
description:
HI TO THE PERSON READING THIS

UM. this game is like really simple, you can use the arrow keys to move around and whatnot and run into things to interact with them. that's pretty much it. it's really easy to find Charlie's knife but if you want, you can wander around for a while!!!! i guess.

uhhhhh

yeah
